Hair and Beauty services of America

HAIR AND BEAUTY SERVICES OF AMERICA is a non-profit organization that provides beauty services to women and seniors with low income levels, who are facing emotional and financial hardship.  In addition, those who had been abused or are in rehabilitation, handicap, hospice, nursing homes and hospitals.By providing these services Hair and Beauty Services of America will allow them to have fresh start in our society such as, helping women with their appearance in finding a job, promote hygiene and boost self-esteem for the elderly.Our services are designed to bring hair and beauty salon services nationwide using our mobile beauticians and stylist from Beauticians on the Go.

Keith Ellis
Professional Clean Comedian ~ Actor - Producer of Comedy Shows - Leighton Agency
May 9, 2011, Keith was a client of Carla’s

I met Carla at a network event a few months ago and she has a very unique service called "Beauticians On The Go". I was not sure where or how this service would be of use to me at the time, but as it happen to turn out I was hired for a photo shoot about a month after meeting Carla.I only had a few days to prepare and get things in order, I called my regular stylist who was not available (do to a death in the family) and her shop was closed for a week.Remembering Carla's services, I decided to take a chance and see what she could do, there are not many places I let cut my hair because it goes in so many directions...lol, you have to kinda learn the grade as they say.I contacted Carla and set up an appointment with no problem. The next day Carla arrived, I let her know how it needs to be cut from showing some older photos and she did not blink an eye, showed no nervousness and wrapped the apron on and went to work.30 Minutes later Carla was done and from haircut, to facial trim (mustache) I was very pleased. Next day at the shoot, I got several compliments on how detailed my cut was, I will definitely be using Carla's services again.Beauticians On The Go, is now locked in my phone:-)

summary: Beauticians On The Go …is a mobile spa and beauty salon the offers personal care to all individuals that cannot travel to a salon, many of our clients have  busy schedules and rather get the service in the comfort of their home.  Other reasons are because they are  home bound, in a care facility,  or  with a disability.   Our main objective is to serve  promptly and fit our services within their busy schedule. We aspire to provide our clients with the highest level of quality and professionalism.
